Verses: 2 naan Seeyonukkaaga Kadum Vairaakkiyankonden; Adharkaaga Magaa Ukkiramaana Vairaakkiyankonden Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

3 naan Seeyonidaththil Thirumbi, Erusalemin Naduvile Vaasampannuven; Erusalem Saththiya Nagaram Endrum, Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Parvadham Parisuththa Parvadham Endrum Azhaikkappadum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 thirumbavum Erusalemin Veedhigalil Mudhirvayadhinaale Thangal Kaigalil Kolaippidiththu Nadakkira Kizhavarum Kizhavigalum Kudiyiruppaargal.
5 nagaraththin Therukkalile Vilaiyaadugira Aanpillaigalum Penpillaigalum Adhin Veedhigalil Niraindhirukkum Endru Senaigalin Karththarsollugiraar.

6 senaigalin Karththar Solgiradhu Ennavendraal: Adhu Indha Janaththil Meedhiyaanavargalin Paarvaikku Innaatkalil Aachchariyamaayirundhaalum, En Paarvaikkum Aachchariyamaayirukkumo Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
7 idho, Kizhakkudhesaththilum Matra Dhesaththilumirundhu En Janangalai Naan Ratchiththu,

8 avargalai Azhaiththukkonduvaruven; Avargal Erusalemin Naduvile Kudiyiruppaargal; Avargal Enakku Unmaiyum Needhiyumaana Janamaayiruppaargal, Naan Avargalukku Dhevanaayiruppen Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 senaigaludaiya Karththarin Veedaagiya Aalayam Kattappadumpadikku Adhin Asthibaarangal Podappatta Naalmudhar Kondirukkira Theerkkadharisigalin Vaayinaal Indha Vaarththaigalai Innaatkalil Kettuvarugiravargale, Ungal Kaigal Thidappadakkadavadhu Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 innaatkalukku Munne Manushanudaiya Velaiyaal Palanumillai, Mirugajeevanudaiya Velaiyaal Palanumillai; Pogiravanukkum Varugiravanukkum Nerukkidaiyinimiththam Samaadhaanamumillai; Ellaa Manusharaiyum Oruvaraiyoruvar Virodhikkachcheydhen.
11 ippodho Indha Janaththil Meedhiyaanavargalukku Naan Mundhinanaatkalil Irundhadhupola Irukkamaatten Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
12 vidhaippu Samaadhaanamulladhaayirukkum; Dhraatchachchedi Than Kaniyaith Tharum; Boomi Than Palanaith Tharum; Vaanam Than Paniyaith Tharu
